TopicTitle: + [ Mod Craft ] Dassault Aircraft Pack ( 2nd Pack )

Articles.Content:
All Repacked in one Megapack

Hi , I packed the first craft from the Dassault Aircraft serie . They come in two version [bD-Armory] & [stock] .

Some with KAX for turboprop .

Dassault Aircraft Megapack :[https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1366&authkey=!ADVtPpAoQ3qMCns&ithint=folder%2ccraft](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1366&authkey=!ADVtPpAoQ3qMCns&ithint=folder%2Ccraft)

I love what you did on the fuel tanks ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif).

Hi !

2nd Pack incoming !

Warm up your engines !

CYA .

I just flew the Mirage III (thank you btw) and if I may, I would like to make a suggestion:

If you make a small modification, you could improve manoeuvrability, massively:

\_use only the pair of wings exterior elevons for roll

\_use both pair of wings elevons for pitch (as it is now actually)

\_use only tail elevons for yaw

Try it, you will be surprised!

> 
> I just flew the Mirage III (thank you btw) and if I may, I would like to make a suggestion:
> If you make a small modification, you could improve manoeuvrability, massively:
> 
> \_use only the pair of wings exterior elevons for roll
> 
> \_use both pair of wings elevons for pitch (as it is now actually)
> 
> \_use only tail elevons for yaw
> 
> Try it, you will be surprised!

THX , after checking i find 3 crafts with the same mistake , erf .. Maybe just forget or set this with AI flight mode , don't know !

I fix this & re-upload proper craft !

Thx again ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
